attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP also trump is an abuser and has smol pp
attributes.review:
This app cursed me and my household!!!
it was lagging so i put in in rice but the rice was cold so i put it in the microwave but when it went off, my microwave was gone!!!! So I put it outside and the SUN DISAPPEARED 🤨 WHAT?! THE SUN IS NOW GONE BECAUSE OF THIS STUPID APP!! i wish i could give it a zero 🙄 and would 😉 this app WILL take your microwave AND THE SUN oh and also it took my desire to live in america i want to move to australia but my parents are mean✨THIS APP IS BOOTY

attributes.title: Almost died!!
attributes.review: This app glitches a lot which can cause some people to have seizures!!! Also when I ordered the McNuggets they didn’t even get here on time and I think it was because this garbage can app messed up my cellular device!! Don’t get this! The radiation is too much for my old bones!! It can be deadly but mr Cheeto puff doesn’t even care about the fact that he kills ppl every day!!! This is a crap hole app✨

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: ✨💕When I had gotten that app, I thought it was going to be informative (coming from all the trump supporters)...But no, it started asking for access to my internet browser. Weird right? But I didn’t look much into it. Later on I went into google to look up Jotaro x reader... The things I saw in my search history was indescribable.. Like really? Mitsuri 18+, Hisoka's abs, and she’s only 18 in dog years?!! Do better trump👁👄👁

attributes.title: Very Glitchy
attributes.review: Before I downloaded this app my phone was perfectly fine. However, when I downloaded it my phone started to randomly exiting out/opening apps without me doing so. It would also make my phone freeze and I would have to restart it. For these reasons I would not download this app. I really hope Trumps team fixes these issues soon.

attributes.title: #1 WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: Honestly my phone was working absolutely fine before I got this app. Once I downloaded it it was just horrible even having it in my phone was just horrible I made my phone want to kill itself because of having this app and I’m so sorry to my phone for doing this to you I owe you a huge apology please anybody who cares about their phone don’t download this. #Your phone matters!

attributes.title: Terrible vibes
attributes.review: This app just radiates bad energy. Honestly as soon as I opened it all my crystals started quivering and my chakras went out of whack immediately. This app will do this to you. It’s almost like a racist, incompetent, self absorbed, megalomaniac person being in charge of anything at all isn’t good for anyone, and this is applicable to both an app and hypothetically a country. Save your vibes y’all, don’t download this bad juju

attributes.title: Brainwashed my father
attributes.review: Please give me back my father. He used to be cool and supportive dad but now he just wears a red hat and talks about fake news. I miss having actual conversations that didn’t lead to basic human rights being a ridiculous idea. Whatever indoctrination you put him through has turned him into a creature that can only think about its own well-being. I miss my father, please give him back.

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app was absolutely awful. It did nothing that I wanted it to do and after downloading it broke my phone. I has to get a completely new phone be wise of this app. Immediately after downloading my phone starting running slow and glitching and eventually turned off entirely. I could never get the phone to turn back on and had to replace it. DO NOT GET THIS APP!

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨🙈Remove the app✨😍🥰
attributes.review: The app takes up too much storage 😤also it killed my turtle it told me I was to fat to use this 🤬 it stole my French fries😠 the app is too slow it glitches also I need buy it just to see the president eating McDonald's 🤮it also shows inappropriate stuff it made my muffins   run away it😭 it gave me a headache😣 it made my fish deaf😔it made my grandma get sick😕so I think the app should be removed😌💅

attributes.title: This App gave me a rash!
attributes.review: I was so excited about downloading this so I could stay updated on the greatest man in the world, but every time I opened the app, a nasty rash would appear, on my face. I don’t know what’s causing it but I think I might have to delete it. What a shame. It also makes my phone run VERY slowly, makes me almost wonder if there is some sort of bug or ViRuS. I do not recommend this to anyone!!!!
